key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.rtf.EnableImages
key.description: Defines, whether the RTF-Export should try to contain images. Currently, this is not a safe method, you might easily encounter OutOfMemoryExceptions, so use that option with care.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.rtf.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.rtf.ShapeAsContent
key.description: Defines whether shapes shall be exported as images to the RTF document. Regardless of this setting, certain shapes will be treated as background and border definitions.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.rtf.StrictLayout
key.description: Defines whether a stricter, but more accurate layout algorithm should be applied. Setting this property to false will greatly reduce the table complexity.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.table.rtf.DeviceResolution
key.description: Adjusts the resolution of the images embedded in the RTF document. By default we use 96 DPI, which is the common default among all browsers.
